name: Koukai
description:
Description

The samurai Rui's village is attacked and destroyed by a powerful enemy. He fails to protect his village and prays to the gods for his life. His request is granted but as punishment, he is encased in stone. Thirty years later, the samurai is freed and embarks on a quest to avenge his village. After so long asleep, his body and mind have forgotten the ancient combat techniques he was once trained in. As the samurai travels through the ruins of his home region to find his attacker, he is forced to remember his past and relearn what he had once mastered.

Controls Current status..

At the moment the game is in alpha and is looking to progress with more polish, abilities and proper flow.
